about_the_game:
In ArsGoetia, you plunge into a world shrouded in darkness, where you must rescue kidnapped children from a hopeless and desperate situation.

You must overcome rapidly moving traps and deadly obstacles, putting everything on the line to ensure the children’s safety.

This perilous journey will push your reflexes and problem-solving skills to their limits.

Each level is designed with new challenges and maze-like structures, filled with unforeseen threats and traps.

As you rescue the children one by one, you must find a way to escape the forces of darkness.

You will experience a desperate journey that goes beyond simply overcoming obstacles to saving the children.

Moreover, as you save the children, you will encounter dialogues filled with their gratitude and fear.

This game is not a series of easy choices. You must gather wisdom and courage to make difficult decisions, and if you fail, you will have to start over from the beginning.

But do not be discouraged. Each failure teaches you a new lesson, helping you move one step closer.

Show your courage by rescuing all the children from the dark castle and leading them to safety.
